headline: Why Enphase (ENPH) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of home energy technology company Enphase (NASDAQ:ENPH) fell 1.4% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs.

headline: Enphase Energy Introduces Next-Generation Battery System For Smarter, Simpler Home Power
summary: Enphase Energy Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH) is among the 11 Best Green Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. Enphase Energy Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH) has launched its fourth-generation Enphase® Energy System, which includes the IQ® Battery 10C, IQ® Meter Collar, and IQ® Combiner 6C. Shipments of the system are now in progress and promise greater energy density, simpler […]
